description:
A man abuses his wife, who is a fish, and lives to regret it.  A monster wants to be carried on someone`s back.  A fox at Ankokuji wants to learn the ways of the buddha.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Fishwife / Obusaritee / The Fox Kid of Ankokuji
Uo Nyoubou / Obusaritee / Ankokuji no Kitsune Kozou
魚女房 / おぶさりてえ / 安国寺のきつね小僧
